CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL ( LS__c ) , null , TEXT( CurrencyIsoCode ) + " " + TEXT ( LS__c ) + " MM" + "/" ) & IF( ISNULL ( TF__c ) , " " , TF__c + "/") & IF( ISNULL ( TA__c ) , " " , TEXT ( TA__c ) + "%") + IF( ISNULL ( PE__c ), null , "/") & IF( ISNULL ( PE__c ) , null , TEXT( CurrencyIsoCode ) + " " + TEXT ( PE__c ) + " MM" )
CustomField.label: Direct Lending (Reporting)
